string-array.name: tortoise_and_hare
string-array.item: Once upon a time there was a tortoise and a hare
The hare liked to brag about how fast he was
The turtle was tired of hearing his friend boast
and so one day, the tortoise challenged the hare to a race
All their animal friends came to watch
and the tortoise and the hare were off!
The hare zoomed down the road and he called back to tortoise
"How do you think you're going to win when you move so so slow?" before he sprinted away
After a while, Hare stopped and thought to himself "I have plenty of time. I might as well take a nap"
so he hid behind a bush at the side of the road and went to sleep
All the while, Tortoise walked and walked
he never ever stopped and soon, he had reached the finish line!
all his animal friends cheered, yelling so loud that they woke Hare from his sleep
Hare hurried back to the race track, but it was too late
Tortoise had won! And so Hare learned a lesson that day
And today he knows, "Don't brag about your lighting page, for slow and steady wins the race"
